text: 4.24 Lom 8.15, Gal 5.1 Pen kesɨm jɨj anɨb ak, takaw yɨpɨl won ogɨnap sek mɨdeb. Bin wog gɨñeb Haga nɨm, Mosis takaw tek ak. Ned God takaw agak ak, Mosis nop ñak dum Saynay. Dum anɨb ak, man Alebiya mɨdeb. Jelusalem abe mɨñɨl mɨdeb ak, dum Saynay tek lup. Bin anɨb ak, ne tap anɨb okok gup tek ak mɨdeb. Anɨb ak, Juda kɨli pelnep Mosis takaw apal ak nɨm, Haga ñapay ne okok bɨ wog gɨñeb yokɨp okok tek mɨdebal.
